'''''Amon Hen'' 151''' is the one-hundred-and-fifty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[1998]].

==Contents==
* Cover: Untitled
** By: Suzanne Stopfel
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* Contents
* Announcements
* Summermoot
** By: Richard Crawshaw
* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* AGM Report
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* ''Finn and Hengest'' review
** By: Andrew Wells
* Events
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Letters Pages
* The Society Library
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Artwork: ''Saruman''
** By: Jeff Vaughan
* News From Fangorn
** By: Lucy Ritchie
* Sally's Snippets
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
